name: Notion Habit Tracker
description: Beat procrastination, develop better habitsBenefits• Capable of tracking your habit progress while on the go• Designed to help you break bad habits that you despise• Keep track of your habit progress week by weekFeatures inside• Progress bar formula• Simple database table view• A collection of color gradient spheres to brighten the mood, vibes and spark joyClick the "I want this!" button to get the templateIn case you’re searching for a complete life planner, do take a look at the Champion’s Lif
